New Records: Ross Adair scored the third T20I century for Ireland
Key Match Events: Ross Adair and Paul Stirling set a new record for the highest opening stand in T20Is for Ireland with 137 runs
South Africa's collapse from 157-3 to 185-9 in the run-chase
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-match insights provided in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mark Adair was instrumental in Ireland's victory with 4-31 from his four overs
Graeme Hume delivered death over deliveries to thwart South Africa's off-side skills
Others: Ryan Rickelton made a quickfire 36 from 22 balls
Reeza Hendricks made 51 to set up a victory platform at 157-3 with four overs remaining
